Package ohos.ivihardware.vehiclecontrol

Provides signal access functions dedicated to vehicles, including vehicle property definition, sensor value retrieval and subscription, and actuator value retrieval, setting, and subscription.

Using this package, applications can obtain vehicle properties, such as the vehicle brand, model, and fuel type.

Applications can also obtain signals generated by the vehicle body, chassis, drivetrain, cabin, and on-board diagnostics (OBD) system.

To access these signals, applications must apply for the corresponding signal access permissions, for example, the permission to read signals from the vehicle body.

Since:
1
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    VehicleBodyManager
    A public class that obtains vehicle signal information in the body.
    VehicleCabinManager
    A public class that obtains vehicle signal information in the cabin.
    VehicleChassisManager
    A public class that obtains vehicle signal information in the chassis.
    VehicleConfigurationManager
    Provides interfaces to obtain vehicle information.
    VehicleDriveTrainManager
    A public class that obtains vehicle signal information in the drivetrain.
    VehicleOBDManager
    A public class that obtains vehicle signal information in the on-board diagnostics (OBD) system.
    VehicleVendorExtensionManager
    A public class that obtains vehicle signal information defined by original equipment manufacturers (OEMs).
    VehicleZone
    Provides vehicle zone information.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    VehicleConfigurationManager.DriverPosition
    Indicates the driver's position in the cabin.
    VehicleConfigurationManager.FuelType
    Indicates the vehicle fuel type.
    VehicleConfigurationManager.RefuelPosition
    Indicates the position of the fuel cover or charge port.
    VehicleConfigurationManager.TransmissionType
    Indicates the transmission type.
